title: 400 error object
description: Return for a POST, PATCH request that contains invalid data, or when the requested action (i.e. book) is not valid.The response must include the reasons for the error.

$schema.description: $schema only included to aid validation of JSON, should not be used in real calls.

ErrorCode.title: Error Code
ErrorCode.description: A symbolic string constant that identifies the error.

ErrorMessage.title: Message
ErrorMessage.description: A summary of the error that occurred.

Availability.title: Error explained in terms of availability and context
Availability.description: A detailed response in terms of Availability, Partial Availability and Unavailabiliy and Context

Link.title: Link
Link.description: A URL to additional help text that may help the caller solve the issue.
